---
id: get-webhook-by-event
title: "GetWebhookByEvent"
description: "Retrieves a webhook configuration based on a specific event type, allowing users to find which webhook is set to trigger for that event."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"GetWebhookByEvent"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/webhook/event/{event}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a webhook configuration based on a specific event type, allowing users to find which webhook is set to trigger for that event.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
